xml:
Foam
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 28 - Spread thinly on the affected skin only

Label 15 - Caution: flammable. Keep your body away from fire or flames after you have put on the medicine

Excipients

May contain

Cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), polysorbates, propylene glycol

Bettamousse 0.1% cutaneous foam <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Focus Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 3186411000001108

Betamethasone (as Betamethasone valerate) 1 mg per 1 gram

  • 100 gram POM

    NHS indicative price = £9.75

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £9.75

BETAMETHASONE
